edu.purdue.dtf

Interface BoardListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GameView

    public interface BoardListener
    BoardListener is implemented on objects that need to do something whenever something important happens in the core game logic, such as a piece being moved.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onPieceMoved(Position a, Position b)
      Called whenever a legal move occurs on the game board.

    • Method Detail

      • onPieceMoved

        void onPieceMoved(Position a,
                Position b)
        Called whenever a legal move occurs on the game board.
        Parameters:
        a - The from position of the move.
        b - The to position of the move.
